EmailTemplate.name: Wyco ErgoPack Promotion 2014-07-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Best results for concrete consolidation. | Wyco ErgoPack Competition: 16 Days Remaining
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wyco ErgoPack Scoring Update
With just over two weeks remaining in the ErgoPack sales competition, the group total has improved to 142 points overall. It's been an impressive run since the ErgoPack was released; let's end this competition on a high note with big sales numbers in the final two weeks!
Tim Elenbaas remains firmly in the top spot after scoring another point since our last update. Mike Nowak of CSI Marketing is closing in, scoring two more points and strengthening his position in second place.
Bill McAnany, also from CSI Marketing, scored two points of his own to vault up the leaderboard within striking distance of third place. Ron Hoffman of Cardinal Sales had the biggest week in the group, tallying a three-pointer to double his overall total.
Commercial Rep Spiff Program Prizes
1st Place: $1,000 Gift Card
2nd Place: $500 Gift Card
Wyco, a Division of Badger Meter, reserves the right to resolve ties with a drawing and to add additional prizes for honorable mentions. All prizes subject to applicable taxes.
Wyco ErgoPack Sales Competition:
16
Days Remaining
Wyco ErgoPack Demo Program
Wyco rep firms may purchase a complete ErgoPack demo unit for 50% off the list price and have 90 days to pay or return the product for full credit.
